entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lazy Loading EF Core and Hot Reload Problem #27398
  • Could not copy error with dotnet ef migrations bundle #27393
  • Slow First Query after project startup #27392
  • Cascade processing calls local DetectChanges even if AutoDetectChangesEnabled is false #27389
  • Getting the Id for the next insert #27387
  • Null Coalesce Operator between two join variable - throws exceptions #27386
  • EF Framework Tools try to build with old SDK #27385
  • Idea for EF Core 7: Fetch aggregate entity instance and related tables in single database trip by combining AsSplitQuery and AsSQLBatch #27384

Closed

  • Ef Core 5 - Many to Many Migration - Dictionary Error #27388
  • Custom Execution Strategy with Entity Framework Core #27368
  • Globally disable the creation of foreign keys during migrations #27382
  • Improve test coverage for migration SQL generation options #23811
    7.0.0
  • F# EF and type providers for SQL #27307

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix for the optimizer when an entity has a collection property that references itself. #27397
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.6 to 8.0.7 #27396
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 #27395
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.23.0 to 3.24.0 #27394
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Allow migration tests to specify migrations options #27331

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #27380
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27375 - EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - migration rollback doesn't work #27379
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • Cosmos: Add IS_DEFINED() function to cosmos provider #27344
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495
    waiting-for-response
